traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The merrow can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The merrow is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The merrow has the following druid spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, minor illusion, shocking grasp * 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, fog cloud, thunderwave * 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, mirror image, misty step * 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, lightning bolt, sleet storm

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the merrow can pull it 10 feet closer.
